info.name: BurgerRoyale_Collection
info.description: Collection that brings together all services and APIs related to the BurgerRoyale project.

item.name: GetHealthCheck - Get health status of the application

request.description: Provides API Health indication.
Login in the system given the CPF.
Retrieves a list of orders based on the status.
Creates a new order.
Updates an existing order by its ID.
Deletes an order by its ID.
Deletes an order by its ID.
Updates an existing order to 'Payment approved' by its ID.
Retrieves a list of products based on the specified category.
Creates a new product.
Retrieves a product by its ID.
Updates an existing product by its ID.
Deletes a product by its ID.
Retrieves a list of users based on the specified type.
Creates a new user.
Retrieves an user by its ID.
Updates an existing user by its ID.
Deletes an user by its ID.
